page.title: 09SOCIAL CONCERNS OF THE AREA
page.content: One group went round parts of our survey area asking shopkeepers and people they met questions about life is like in the survey area.The people included a nun,a shopkeeper from a chinese takeaway,a shopkeeper fom an Asian food shop and a housewife. One of the people asked had had their house burgaled.None of the people had been mugged.All the people asked felt that area was very untidy because of graffiti and litter and several people said that they would like more safe places for children to play. The area has many moslum families there,and there leader Molbi Shah, was interviewed,he said that he would like to see English and Asian families mixing together more.
